questionTitle: One ________ of his job is that it is near where I live.
The children loved ________ the old castle.
This is a photograph of the school I ________ when I lived in Swindon.
Freda: Do you know our city at all? Barry: No, it's the first time ________ here.
Many accidents are caused by ________ driving.
Mr and Mrs Black were delighted when they ________ to sell their house so quickly.
It sounds ________ the situation is unlikely to improve.
He ________ very quickly after his illness.
Caring for her younger brother is a ________ burden for her, but she never complains.
The President made a wonderful ________.
There is a fault at our television station. Please do not ________ your set.
He ________ going by plane instead of hovercraft.
Please concentrate ________ what you are doing.
Many people do not approve ________ blood-sport.
You must encourage him ________ his efforts.
The ball ________ two or three times before rolling down the slope.
It's ________ helping you.
Would you agree that men pay less attention ________ than women do?
We can only give you the ________ number of refugees crossing the border at the moment.
As drunk as ________ = very drunk.
